description: Numbers n that cannot be decomposed into the sum of up to 4 squares using the following algorithm: If n is not decomposable using the algorithm: [Repeat the following 2 steps 4 times: 1-find the largest square s smaller than n; 2-n=n-s Numbers that can be decomposed yield final values of n=0.] then choose the first square as the second largest square smaller than n and try finding the remaining up to 3 squares using the 2 steps of the algorithm in brackets.
